name: The Maiden's Protector
description:
A compact JRPG with three fights. You can use one skill from each of your paladin artifacts—your sword, shield, circlet, and beads—before you have to recharge all of them using a recovery litany. Use the arrow keys to move and Z and X to navigate menus.

Contains a jumpscare.

Music by Jasprelao, Jeremiah "McTricky" George, Tarranon, and Murray Atkinson. SFX, font, and probably some other assets by Enterbrain.
